mission.posting: Encryption Inc. is a software company famous for making encryption software. They have some decryption tools for those encryptions we will need.

email.subject: Encryption Incorporated
email.body:
Encryption Inc. is on the radar today. They are responsible for creating the world's best encryption software. Recently, they've developed a decryption suite that will be very useful in the future. Your mission is to infiltrate Encryption Inc. and steal the decryption softwares. Once you manage to get a copy of the suite, upload the programs to the drop server.
-L
